Languages.string: understands Celestial and Common but can't speak

MonsterTrait.Name: Magic Resistance
MonsterTrait.Text: The temple dog has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

MonsterTrait.Name: Protector's Initiative
MonsterTrait.Text: If the temple dog is entering combat against a clear threat to its temple, it has advantage on its initiative roll.

MonsterTrait.Name: Rushing Slam
MonsterTrait.Text: If the temple dog moves at least 10 feet straight toward a target and then makes a slam attack against that target, it can make an additional slam attack against a second creature within 5 feet of the first target as a bonus action.

MonsterAction.Name: Bite
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (3d8 + 4) piercing damage plus 9 (2d4 + 4) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 14). The target must also make a successful DC 15 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of its next turn.

MonsterAction.Name: Slam
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (3d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone and pushed 5 feet. The temple dog can immediately enter the position the target was pushed out of, if it chooses to.
